diagnostic_test.title: Urinalysis
diagnostic_test.text: Analyzes urine for a variety of health indicators, including kidney function, urinary tract infections, and more.

diagnostic_test.title: Complete Blood Count
diagnostic_test.text: Measures the levels of different blood cells to assess overall health and detect a variety of disorders.

diagnostic_test.title: Blood type & Rh Factor
diagnostic_test.text: Determines an individual's blood type and Rh factor, essential for blood transfusions and pregnancy.

diagnostic_test.title: STI Tests
diagnostic_test.text: Screens for common sexually transmitted infections, such as HIV, syphilis, chlamydia, and gonorrhea.

test_packages.title: Family Test Package
test_packages.text: Ensure a healthy future with detailed health assessments for couples preparing for marriage.

test_packages.title: Women's Health
test_packages.text: Monitor and enhance women's health, from hormonal balance to reproductive wellness.

test_packages.title: Full Body Checkup
test_packages.text: Stay on top of your health with examinations that covers all essential aspects of your well-being.
